segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s making a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be really upset when she finally notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching so high, and the stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, so patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will slip before she realizes what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked neatly, but the rest of the kitchen is a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are going to get in trouble when she finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall if he doesn’t stop climbing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR
